title: Energy conservation- energy in block-spring system

content.question: A block of mass <math alttext="m" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>m</mi></math> is attached to a horizontal spring, as shown, and is free to move on a horizontal surface at a height <math alttext="h" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>h</mi></math> above the ground. Friction between the block and the surface is negligible. The block is initially held at rest at position <math alttext="x equals negative A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>âˆ’</mo><mi>A</mi></mstyle></math> with the spring compressed. The block is released, and it moves to the right, passing position <math alttext="x equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>, at which point the spring is at its unstretched length, with speed <math alttext="v sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math>. The block then momentarily comes to rest at position <math alttext="x equals positive A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>+</mo><mi>A</mi></mstyle></math>. Which of the following is a correct expression for the total mechanical energy of the system consisting of only the spring and the block after the block is released?

choices.label: <math alttext="one half m v sub 0, end sub, squared plus one half k A squared, plus m g h" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>m</mi><msubsup><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>k</mi><msup><mi>A</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><mi>h</mi></math>

<math alttext="one half m v sub 0, end sub, squared plus one half k A squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>m</mi><msubsup><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>k</mi><msup><mi>A</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>

<math alttext="one half m v sub 0, end sub, squared plus m g h" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>m</mi><msubsup><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup><mo>+</mo><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><mi>h</mi></math>
<math alttext="one half k A squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>k</mi><msup><mi>A</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="one half k A squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>k</mi><msup><mi>A</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mstyle></math>
